wikipedia_page.main:
Michael Marshall is a professional drift driver, competing in the British Drift Championship.
Michael won the Pro class of the 2011 season in his Nissan Silvia S15, in 2013 he later went on to win the main Super Pro class in a 2JZ-GTE powered BMW E36 Touring after a string of consistent results.He is also the owner of MnM Engineering, a Japanese tuning garage in Rochester, Kent.

response: * Michael Marshall, pen name of Michael Marshall Smith (born 1965), British writer
* Michael Marshall, Melbourne gangland war victim, see Carl Williams
